name: Ordem / Order in a plastic bag
description: A liberdade no Brasil depende de uma sacola plástica. Depois de mais de 20 anos após um de seus períodos políticos mais sombrios, o Brasil está novamente apaixonado pelo fascismo. *** The freedom in Brazil relies on a plastic bag. After more than 20 years after one of its darkests political periods, Brazil is again in love with fascism. Pandemia and politically speaking: we are suffocating. Pedro Surubim (@osurubim), performs his perception of the caos of being a Brazilian artist in 2020/2021.
